name: Happy Trail
description:
Controls: 

Use the mouse to create a trail for the smiley to collide with

Criteria: 

Endless Runner = the game is an endless runner where the player must guide the smiley as far as you can to the right

Happy = the player sprite is a happy face

Hyperactive = the player speeds up when he hits an arrow box

Chip tune = retro music

Credits:

All art and code was created by me during the period of the jam

The music is from  https://opengameart.org/content/5-chiptunes-action
